core.descr: This object specifies the interface to be configured for GARP Parameters
This object specifies the interface to be configured for GARP Parameters

This object specifies the administrative state of GMRP operation on this port. The value enabled(1) indicates that GMRP is enabled on this port in all VLANs as long as dot1dGmrpStatus is also enabled(1). A value of disabled(2) indicates that GMRP is disabled on this port in al
This object specifies the total number of failed GMRP registrations, for any reason, in all VLANs, on this port.
This object specifies the Source MAC Address of the last GMRP message received on this port.
